attributes.action: Forbid oil companies and garages to charge fractions of a penny.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Fuel is currently charged using prices which include fractions of a penny i.e. 0.9p.  This is not legal tender so should not be allowed.  This gives motorists a deceptively low conception of the actual price charged.  The actual amount spent is impossible to collect.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
